proposal: Understanding the groundbreaking work Parobot is doing with AI, Depin, and Restaking on the zkTAO sidechain, it's clear you're paving the way for blockchain's future. Congrats on reaching 403 holders on the ETH network! Imagine integrating our DEX or Lottery tools to further engage your community, offering them more ways to interact and benefit from your ecosystem. Let's explore how our B2B tools can align with your vision, making blockchain not just innovative but also more rewarding for your community.
